Taro &amp; Sweet Potato Balls

Feb 9, 2025

Taro Ball Ingredients





Sweet Potato Ball Ingredients





Procedure

  1. Mix paste, starch, and sugar. Add hot water to form dough.
  2. Roll into small balls.
  3. Boil until they float. Serve warm or cold.
